name: Indie Horror Nowadays
description:
This is a game about the state of indie horror games in 2022-2023.

it's not a good game and this was done on purpose, there is no lore.

Please, for your own sake, don't spend more than half an hour playing this game because if you spend more than half an hour playing this game, you really need to get a life.

Story: u wer send to area 69 to kill big scawy monstew

#horror #shooter #other #bad #meme
